programme.title: Sweet Sweet Codeine
programme.short_synopsis: In Nigeria, young people are addicted to codeine syrup, a medicine becoming a street drug.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Nigerian senate estimates that 3 million bottles of codeine are drunk daily in just two states – Kano and Jigawa. Who makes this syrup and who sells it to Nigeria’s students?
programme.long_synopsis:
In Nigeria, thousands of young people are addicted to codeine cough syrup – a medicine that’s become a street drug.

The Nigerian senate estimates that 3 million bottles of codeine syrup are drunk every day in just two states – Kano and Jigawa. 

But who makes this syrup? And who sells it to Nigeria’s students?

BBC Africa Eye went undercover to investigate.
